settings.title: Painted {Juttay}
settings.description: Hand-painted sneakers that tell stories. Each pair is a canvas, each step is a statement. Premium custom art sneakers by Pakistani artists.

settings.title: Our
settings.subtitle: Each collection tells a different story, crafted by passionate artists who transform ordinary shoes into extraordinary art pieces.

settings.title: Commission Your Art
settings.subtitle: Work with our talented artists to create a completely unique pair that tells your story.

settings.name: Rabail Ali Zaidi
settings.bio: A multidisciplinary artist with a background in fine arts and architectural design. Her work explores the relationship between surface, form, and narrative — often blending visual art with functional design.

settings.name: Sarah Maqsood
settings.bio: Sarah Maqsood specializes in creating black and white ink illustrations, often with a tinge of color to them. Her goal is to not only limit her art to pen and paper, but to let it be worn and carried.

settings.name: The Kharazmi Sisters
settings.bio: The Kharazmi Sisters are 2 sisters with a passion for artistic expressions ranging across handicrafts, Epoxy products, hand-woven articles, paintings, custom artwork and digital design.

settings.title: Our Artists
settings.subtitle: Meet the talented creators from Pakistan who bring each pair to life with their unique vision and artistic mastery.

settings.title: Authentic Artistry
settings.description: Every piece is hand-painted by talented Pakistani artists, ensuring each pair tells a unique story.

settings.title: Cultural Bridge
settings.description: Connecting Pakistani street art with global streetwear culture, one step at a time.

settings.title: Custom Craftsmanship
settings.description: From concept to creation, we work with you to bring your vision to life on premium sneakers.

settings.title: Quality Promise
settings.description: Using only the finest materials and techniques to ensure your art lasts as long as your story.

settings.title: Consultation
settings.description: We discuss your vision, style preferences, and the story you want to tell through your custom piece.

settings.title: Design
settings.description: Our artists create detailed sketches and color concepts based on your requirements.

settings.title: Creation
settings.description: Hand-painting begins with careful attention to detail, bringing your vision to life.

settings.title: Delivery
settings.description: Your unique art piece is carefully packaged and delivered to your doorstep.

settings.title: Where Art Meets Street
settings.subtitle: Painted Juttay began as a vision to transform ordinary sneakers into extraordinary works of art. We believe that every step should tell a story, and every story deserves to be painted with passion.
settings.mission_text: To empower Pakistani artists by providing them with a global platform while creating wearable art that celebrates culture, creativity, and individual expression. We're not just painting shoes—we're painting dreams, stories, and connections across cultures.
